entities.name: death eater
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of dark wizards and witches who follow Lord Voldemort. They are mentioned in the context of someone walking free.

relationships.description: Moody is associated with Death Eaters, as he mentions that a Death Eater walked free.
Harry owns the map, which Moody wants to borrow.
Moody wants to borrow Harry's map.
Harry owes Moody a favor, as he is relieved that Moody isn't asking where he got the map from.
